title: What are the samples that can be used for forensic investigations? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just about anything. Blood, hair, fibers, tool marks, fingerprints, saliva, semen, plastic remnants, ballistics, clothing, autopsy results, audio, video, IP addresses, cell phone data, weapon or implement used in the crime, dirt, flora, pet hairs. Anything that has a unique characteristic that could be matched to evidence obtained at the time or later seized, that shows a connection between the suspect, the evidence and the crime. With today’s use of DNA evidence so prevalent, my advice is, be nice, don’t commit crimes. Dr. Gregory M. LousignontCriminal Psychologist
